Uses of Interface
ml.alternet.scan.NumberConstraint

  • Packages that use NumberConstraint 
    Package Description
    ml.alternet.parser
    Allow to design grammar, parse input and generate a custom data structure.
    ml.alternet.scan
    Scan Unicode character streams.

    • Uses of NumberConstraint in ml.alternet.parser

      Methods in ml.alternet.parser with parameters of type NumberConstraint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Grammar.Number Grammar.number(NumberConstraint constraint)
      Create a number token.

    • Uses of NumberConstraint in ml.alternet.scan

      Classes in ml.alternet.scan that implement NumberConstraint 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  NumberConstraint.NumberClassConstraint
      Base class for checking constraints on number types.
      static class  NumberConstraint.Type
      A constraint on numbers : after parsing the number, it will be of the type given.
      Fields in ml.alternet.scan declared as NumberConstraint 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static NumberConstraint NumberConstraint.BYTE_CONSTRAINT
      A constraint for parsing bytes.
      static NumberConstraint NumberConstraint.DECIMAL_CONSTRAINT
      A constraint for parsing decimal.
      static NumberConstraint NumberConstraint.DOUBLE_CONSTRAINT
      A constraint for parsing a double.
      static NumberConstraint NumberConstraint.FLOAT_CONSTRAINT
      A constraint for parsing a float.
      static NumberConstraint NumberConstraint.INT_CONSTRAINT
      A constraint for parsing integers.
      static NumberConstraint NumberConstraint.INTEGER_CONSTRAINT
      A constraint for parsing integers.
      static NumberConstraint NumberConstraint.LONG_CONSTRAINT
      A constraint for parsing longs.
      static NumberConstraint NumberConstraint.NO_CONSTRAINT
      When there is no constraint, there is no stop condition (that always return true).
      static NumberConstraint NumberConstraint.SHORT_CONSTRAINT
      A constraint for parsing shorts.
      Methods in ml.alternet.scan with parameters of type NumberConstraint 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Number Scanner.nextNumber(NumberConstraint constraint)
      Read the next number.
